price: ដូចេ្នះ តើ(អ្វីដែលពួកអ្នកកំពុងតែមើលឃើញ)នេះជា មន្ដអាគមឬ? ឬមួយពួកអ្នកមើលមិនឃើញ?
arabic: أَفَسِحۡرٌ هَٰذَآ أَمۡ أَنتُمۡ لَا تُبۡصِرُونَ

version.title: Khmer translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Khmer, published by Development Society of Muslim Cambodian Society. The second edition was issued in 2012.

meta.transliteration: afasiḥ'run hādhā am antum lā tub'ṣirūna
